title: Eugenia Cheng
summary: Eugenia Loh-Gene Cheng is a British mathematician and concert pianist. Her mathematical interests include higher category theory, and as a pianist she specialises in lieder and art song.[4] She is also passionate about explaining mathematics to non-mathematicians to rid the world of math phobia, often using entertaining analogies with food and baking.[5] Cheng is a scientist-in-residence at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago.[6][7][8]
